name: C2. Guessing the Greatest  hard version
statement:
.There is an array a of n numbers. In one query you can ask the position
of the second maximum element in a subsegment a[l..r]. Find the position
of the maximum element in the array in no more than queries.A subsegment
a[l..r] is all the elements a_l, a_{l + 1}, ..., a_r. After asking this
subsegment you will be given the position of the second maximum from
this subsegment array.
